QuestData.Title: The Sanctum Wards
QuestData.Description: Our first priority is to capture the Sun's Reach Sanctum. Once we've secured it, we'll be able to use its energy to open a portal from Shattrath.$B$BThe sanctum is overrun with the Wretched - former blood elves who've devolved into mindless husks of their former selves. Its defenses would've normally prevented this intrusion, but the Wretched have stolen the power sources from the protective wards.$B$BHunt down the Wretched and get the mana remnants they carry. Use them to energize the sanctum wards.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Theris Dawnhearth at the Shattered Sun Staging Area wants you to obtain 4 Mana Remnants from Wretched Fiends and Wretched Devourers and use them to energize one of the Crystal Wards surrounding the Sun's Reach Sanctum to the east.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Captain Theris Dawnhearth at the Shattered Sun Staging Area in Isle of Quel'Danas.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you reactivated the crystal wards, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. The wards are slowly regaining their power. The sanctum will be ours in no time!
